definition: Ang Li (1954-), Taiwanese-American film director (films include Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon 臥虎藏龍|卧虎藏龙 and Brokeback Mountain 斷背山|断背山)
plum
surname Li
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An

sentences.english: And Lee Hom happens to be in Ang Lee's new movie- Lust, Caution.
sentences.chinese: 力宏在李安的新電影《色戒》中扮演了角色。

sentences.english: The two talked a bit and Tiber gave Lee a copy of his book.
sentences.chinese: 雙方談了一會，泰伯給了李安他的一本書。

sentences.english: Ang Lee's spy thriller "Lust, Caution" was named best Asian movie.
sentences.chinese: 李安的間諜懸疑片《色戒》獲得了最佳亞洲電影獎。

sentences.english: Ang Lee’s Crouching Tiger had kind of done so.
sentences.chinese: 但是李安的《臥虎藏龍》在某些方面已經做到了。

sentences.english: Throughout his career, Ang Lee has sought to explore complex themes in his movies.
sentences.chinese: 在李安的藝術生涯中，他一直在追尋更深刻的主題。

sentences.english: Lee's tried to tell it in a Chinese style, and it's great that he's done so.
sentences.chinese: 李安試圖用中國風來敘述，他這樣做非常偉大。

sentences.english: So Lee agreed to make cuts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，李安同意做鏡頭刪減。
